description: professional grade exercise balance discs are made with heavy-duty PVC for use at home, or in a gym setting. Each balance disc has massage spikes for maximum comfort and grip. The balance discs are perfect for improving balance, coordination, and joint and core strength. They are also perfect for active sitting. Each balance disc includes a hand pump for easy inflation and deflation. With a 13 inch diameter, the discs are designed with ample room to be effective for all types of exercises. The Black Mountain Products balance discs are wonderful items to use in conjunction with our other great products to get a convenient total body workout in your own home or abroad.
